snippet: Wall Street closed flat Monday, the first session after Friday’s sell-off, as Washington reported a decline in factory orders.
abstract: Stocks reverse losses and close nearly unchanged, as factory orders decline.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street closed flat Monday, the first session after Friday’s sell-off, as Washington reported a decline in factory orders.

headline.main: After a Slip, Markets End Near Where They Started
headline.print_headline: After a Slip, Markets End Near Where They Started
